price: Na hakika walikaribia kukushawishi uache tuliyo kufunulia ili utuzulie mengineyo. Na hapo ndio wangeli kufanya rafiki.
arabic: وَإِن كَادُواْ لَيَفۡتِنُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ لِتَفۡتَرِيَ عَلَيۡنَا غَيۡرَهُۥۖ وَإِذٗا لَّٱتَّخَذُوكَ خَلِيلٗا
footnotes: Hakika washirikina wanatafuta kila njia wakuachishe Qur'ani utafute miujiza myengineyo, ili uwe kama uliye tuzulia Sisi uwongo. Na hapo ndio watakufanya uwe rafiki yao! Na hila hizi zimekaririwa na zimekuwa nyingi. Na kwa hivyo ungeli karibia kuyafuata wayatakayo, ila kwa kuwa wewe ni Mtume wetu uliye muaminifu, hayakuwa hayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-in kādū layaftinūnaka ʿani alladhī awḥaynā ilayka litaftariya ʿalaynā ghayrahu wa-idhan la-ittakhadhūka khalīlan
